content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava. Can I get your name to get started with your HVAC service request?
Hi, um, it's Carol. I need some help with my air conditioner.
Thank you, Carol! Can you please provide your address so I can check our technician's availability for your location?
Great, thank you! Let me check if you're within our service area.

I'm having trouble determining if your address is within our service area. Let me get a human team member to help you. Someone will reach out to assist as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience!
reason: Service area location could not be determined. Awaiting manual follow-up.
